commands.name: 24 Game
commands.description: Generates 4 random numbers for the 24 game.

commands.name: 24 Parser
commands.description: Checks whether your answer for the 24 game evaluates to 24 (or an inputted target).

commands.name: 24 Plus Game
commands.description: Generates 4 random numbers for the 24 game this time from 1 to 12 and a random target from 1 to 100.

commands.name: Anonymous Post Current
commands.description: Make posts anonymously in the current channel.

commands.name: Anonymous Post Channel
commands.description: Make posts anonymously in another channel.

commands.name: Anonymous Post Allow [ADMIN]
commands.description: Allows anonymous posts to be sent in a channel.

commands.name: Anonymous Post Allow Current [ADMIN]
commands.description: Allows anonymous posts to be sent in the current channel.

commands.name: Anonymous Post Disallow [ADMIN]
commands.description: Disallows anonymous posts to be sent in a channel.

commands.name: Anonymous Post Disallow Current [ADMIN]
commands.description: Disallows anonymous posts to be sent in the current channel.

commands.name: Anonymous Post Whitelist [ADMIN]
commands.description: Displays all allowed channels for anonymous posts.

commands.name: Cancel Post [ADMIN]
commands.description: Cancel a scheduled post

commands.name: Coin Flip
commands.description: Tosses a coin and rondom gives head or tails.

commands.name: Connect 4
commands.description: Starts a game of Connect 4

commands.name: Create VC
commands.description: Create a temporary voice channel

commands.name: FAQ Help
commands.description: Gets information about the faq command

commands.name: FAQ Get
commands.description: Gets information related to a certain keyword

commands.name: FAQ Get All
commands.description: Gets all information related to a certain tag

commands.name: FAQ Tags
commands.description: Gets a list of all tags which currently exist

commands.name: FAQ Admin Create [ADMIN]
commands.description: Creates a FAQ entry

commands.name: FAQ Admin Delete [ADMIN]
commands.description: Deletes a FAQ entry

commands.name: Handbook Course Info
commands.description: Displays information about a course from the UNSW Handbook

commands.name: Joke
commands.description: Gets a random joke

commands.name: Log Report Today [ADMIN]
commands.description: Gets all message logs from today

commands.name: Log Report Time Period [ADMIN]
commands.description: Gets all message logs from specified days

commands.name: Meeting Queue
commands.description: Generates a queue from VC participants

commands.name: Meeting Random
commands.description: Selects a random VC participant

commands.name: Meeting Groups
commands.description: Forms groups from VC participants

commands.name: Ping
commands.description: Replies with a pong, why are you reading this?

commands.name: React For Role
commands.description: Creates a new role and assigns it to any user who reacts with a given emoji

commands.name: Role Give
commands.description: Gives a role to a user

commands.name: Role Remove
commands.description: Removes a role from a user

commands.name: Role Count [ADMIN]
commands.description: Displays the number of users with a given role

commands.name: Role Remove Unverified [ADMIN]
commands.description: Removes all users with the unverified role

commands.name: Schedule Post [ADMIN]
commands.description: Schedule a post to be sent in a channel at a given time

commands.name: Standup Status Get Full Standups [ADMIN]
commands.description: Returns all standups for a team and members who have not completed a standup yet.

commands.name: Tic Tac Toe
commands.description: Starts a game of Tic Tac Toe

commands.name: Start Vote
commands.description: Starts a vote

commands.name: Vote Results
commands.description: Gets results for the last vote in the current channel

commands.name: Vote Results Full
commands.description: Gets full results for the last vote in the current channel

commands.name: Wordle Play
commands.description: Picks a new word if one hasn't been selected and starts a new game

commands.name: Wordle Guess
commands.description: Submits a guess for the wordle game

commands.name: XKCD Latest
commands.description: Gets the latest xkcd comic

commands.name: XKCD Get
commands.description: Gets the xkcd comic by its number id

commands.name: XKCD Random
commands.description: Gets a random xkcd comic
